reference.title: cxxClassTemplateParameter
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxClassTemplateParameter> element describes a class parameter.

section.title: Description
section.p: One or more <cxxClassTemplateParameter> elements reside within the <cxxClassTemplateParameters> container. <cxxClassTemplateParameter> requires the child element <cxxClassTemplateParameterType>; that describes the type of parameter. <cxxClassTemplateParameter> may also contain the child element <apiDefNote> to describe the parameter further.
